alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 05 at 2:08PM AKST until March 07 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST TUESDAY... ...BLIZZARD WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Additional snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches and ice accumulations up to 0.05 inches expected. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph this evening, then gradually weakening overnight. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snow accumulations expected on the Bering Strait Coast.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
